articles.author: SAM MEDNICK
articles.title: Niger crisis deepens as European nations evacuate and coup leaders get support from other juntas - The Associated Press
articles.description: A French military transport plane carrying Europeans from Niger arrived in Paris Wednesday, in the first such evacuation flight since mutinous soldiers ousted the country’s democratically elected president nearly a week ago and shut its borders. France, Italy…
articles.content: NIAMEY, Niger (AP) A French military transport plane carrying Europeans from Niger arrived in Paris Wednesday, in the first such evacuation flight since mutinous soldiers ousted the countrys democrat… [+7156 chars]

articles.author: WION Video Team
articles.title: Will the coup in Uranium-rich Niger drive France & Europe into a deep energy crisis? - WION
articles.description: Niger is in deep water. Being one of the poorest nations. Niger is losing its allies and financial assistance.
